name: Rocketcat
description: Rocketcat is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. This unique robot has an orange box body with a screen in the shape of a cat. Its arms and legs are equipped with rocket boosters, allowing it to move swiftly and gracefully. Rocketcat also features a set of cool shades as its special add-on, giving it a stylish and futuristic appearance.
